metadata.synopsis: This dialog appears when the player reach the Knigts of the Shield hideout, from the Elfsong Tavern or from the undercity.
metadata.how_to_trigger: When a party character enter in one of this triggers: S_LOW_Elfsong_Basement_GithEntrance_58fb5b44-9fc5-448b-9c6d-1fc97db6e076S_LOW_Elfsong_Basement_GithEntrance_000_84d1f118-d2a1-4bbd-a4c3-eae7e2f0bfe3

2.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
2.text: Sooner or later, even the hunted return to their den.

0.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
0.text: In the meantime, tear every brick out if you have to. If it doesn't come, we must find evidence of its whereabouts.
